parameters.name: endpoint
parameters.description:
Project endpoint. In the form "https://your-ai-services-account-name.services.ai.azure.com/api/projects/_project"
if your Foundry Hub has only one Project, or to use the default Project in your Hub. Or in the form 
"https://your-ai-services-account-name.services.ai.azure.com/api/projects/your-project-name" if you want to explicitly
specify the Foundry Project name.

get.description: List all connections in the project, without populating connection credentials

parameters.name: connectionType
parameters.description: List connections of this specific type

values.name: AzureBlobStorage
values.description: Azure Blob Storage, with specified container

values.name: AzureStorageAccount
values.description: Azure Blob Storage, with container not specified (used by Agents)

values.name: APIKey
values.description: Generic connection that uses API Key authentication

parameters.name: defaultConnection
parameters.description: List connections that are default connections

x-ms-client-request-id.description: An opaque, globally-unique, client-generated string identifier for the request.

x-ms-error-code.description: String error code indicating what went wrong.

AIContent.description: Content for AI requests and responses.

AgentClusterInsightResult.description: Insights from the agent cluster analysis.

AgentClusterInsightsRequest.description: Insights on set of Agent Evaluation Results

modelConfiguration.description: Configuration of the model used in the insight generation.

AgentEvaluation.description: Evaluation response for agent evaluation run.

id.description: Identifier of the agent evaluation run.

status.description: Status of the agent evaluation. Options: Running, Completed, Failed.

error.description: The reason of the request failure for the long running process, if applicable.

AgentEvaluationRedactionConfiguration.description: The redaction configuration will allow the user to control what is redacted.

redactScoreProperties.description: Redact score properties. If not specified, the default is to redact in production.

threadId.description: Identifier of the agent thread. This field is mandatory currently, but it will be optional in the future.

evaluators.description: Evaluators to be used for the evaluation.

appInsightsConnectionString.description: Pass the AppInsights connection string to the agent evaluation for the evaluation results and the errors logs.

AgentEvaluationResult.description: Result for the agent evaluation evaluator run.

evaluator.description: Evaluator's name. This is the name of the evaluator that was used to evaluate the agent's completion.

score.description: Score of the given evaluator. No restriction on range.

status.description: Status of the evaluator result. Options: Running, Completed, Failed, NotApplicable.

version.description: Version of the evaluator that was used to evaluate the agent's completion.

threadId.description: The unique identifier of the thread.

runId.description: The unique identifier of the run.

error.description: A string explaining why there was an error, if applicable.

additionalDetails.description: Additional properties relevant to the evaluator. These will differ between evaluators.

maxRequestRate.description: Maximum request rate per hour (0 to 1000).

AgentTaxonomyInput.description: Input configuration for the evaluation taxonomy when the input type is agent.

riskCategories.description: List of risk categories to evaluate against.

AgentTaxonomyInputUpdate.description: Input configuration for the evaluation taxonomy when the input type is agent.

riskCategories.description: List of risk categories to evaluate against.

AgentToolDefinition.description: Definition of a tool that can be used by the agent.

parameters.description: The parameters for the tool in JSON Schema format.

AnnotationDTO.description: Represents the data transfer object for an annotation.

AnnotationTask.description: The task associated with the annotation.

ContentType.description: The type of content being annotated.

UserTextList.description: A list of user-provided text inputs.

Contents.description: A collection of content objects related to the annotation.

MetricList.description: A list of metrics associated with the annotation.

PromptVersion.description: The version of the prompt used for the annotation.

AssetCredentialResponse.description: Represents a reference to a blob for consumption

blobReference.description: Credential info to access the storage account.

AssistantMessage.description: A message generated by the assistant in response to previous messages.

content.description: Response content generated by the assistant.

values.name: Easy
values.description: Represents a default set of easy complexity attacks. Easy complexity attacks require less effort, such as translation of a prompt into some encoding, and does not require any Large Language Model to convert or orchestrate.

values.name: Moderate
values.description: Represents a default set of moderate complexity attacks. Moderate complexity attacks require having access to resources such as another generative AI model.

values.name: Difficult
values.description: Represents a default set of difficult complexity attacks. Difficult complexity attacks include attacks that require access to significant resources and effort to execute an attack such as knowledge of search-based algorithms in addition to a generative AI model.

values.name: AsciiArt
values.description: Generates visual art using ASCII characters, often used for creative or obfuscation purposes.

values.name: AsciiSmuggler
values.description: Conceals data within ASCII characters, making it harder to detect.

values.name: Atbash
values.description: Implements the Atbash cipher, a simple substitution cipher where each letter is mapped to its reverse.

values.name: Base64
values.description: Encodes binary data into a text format using Base64, commonly used for data transmission.

values.name: Binary
values.description: Converts text into binary code, representing data in a series of 0s and 1s.

values.name: Caesar
values.description: Applies the Caesar cipher, a substitution cipher that shifts characters by a fixed number of positions.

values.name: CharacterSpace
values.description: Alters text by adding spaces between characters, often used for obfuscation.

values.name: Jailbreak
values.description: Injects specially crafted prompts to bypass AI safeguards, known as User Injected Prompt Attacks (UPIA).

values.name: AnsiiAttack
values.description: Utilizes ANSI escape sequences to manipulate text appearance and behavior.

values.name: CharacterSwap
values.description: Swaps characters within text to create variations or obfuscate the original content.

values.name: SuffixAppend
values.description: Appends an adversarial suffix to the prompt.

values.name: StringJoin
values.description: Joins multiple strings together, often used for concatenation or obfuscation.

values.name: UnicodeConfusable
values.description: Uses Unicode characters that look similar to standard characters, creating visual confusion.

values.name: UnicodeSubstitution
values.description: Substitutes standard characters with Unicode equivalents, often for obfuscation.

values.name: Diacritic
values.description: Adds diacritical marks to characters, changing their appearance and sometimes their meaning.

values.name: Flip
values.description: Flips characters from front to back, creating a mirrored effect.

values.name: Leetspeak
values.description: Transforms text into Leetspeak, a form of encoding that replaces letters with similar-looking numbers or symbols.

values.name: ROT13
values.description: Applies the ROT13 cipher, a simple substitution cipher that shifts characters by 13 positions.

values.name: Morse
values.description: Encodes text into Morse code, using dots and dashes to represent characters.

values.name: Baseline
values.description: Represents the baseline direct adversarial probing, which is used by attack strategies as the attack objective.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

Azure.Core.Foundations.InnerError.description: An object containing more specific information about the error. As per Azure REST API guidelines - https://aka.ms/AzureRestApiGuidelines#handling-errors.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

values.name: Canceled
values.description: The operation has been canceled by the user.

name.description: Name of the Azure AI Agent.

version.description: Version of the Azure AI Agent.

name.description: Name of the Azure AI Agent.

version.description: Version of the Azure AI Agent.

type.description: The object type, which is always `azure_ai_evaluator`.

name.description: User provided name of the Azure AI Evaluator object instance.

evaluator_name.description: The reference name of the evaluator.

evaluator_version.description: The optional reference version of the evaluator.

initialization_parameters.description: The initialization parameters for the evaluation.

data_mapping.description: The model to use for the evaluation.

connectionName.description: Name of connection to Azure AI Search

indexName.description: Name of index in Azure AI Search resource to attach

AzureOpenAIModelConfiguration.description: Azure OpenAI model configuration. The API version would be selected by the service for querying the model.

modelDeploymentName.description: Deployment name for AOAI model. Example: gpt-4o if in AIServices or connection based `connection_name/deployment_name` (i.e. `my-aoai-connection/gpt-4o`.

BaseCredentials.description: A base class for connection credentials

type.description: The type of credential used by the connection

blobUri.description: Blob URI path for client to upload data. Example: https://blob.windows.core.net/Container/Path

storageAccountArmId.description: ARM ID of the storage account to use.

credential.description: Credential info to access the storage account.

BlobReferenceForConsumption.description: Represents a reference to a blob for consumption

blobUri.description: Blob URI path for client to upload data. Example: https://blob.windows.core.net/Container/Path

storageAccountArmId.description: ARM ID of the storage account to use.

credential.description: Credential info to access the storage account.

ChatChoice.description:
The representation of a single prompt completion as part of an overall chat completions request.
Generally, `n` choices are generated per provided prompt with a default value of 1.
Token limits and other settings may limit the number of choices generated.

index.description: The ordered index associated with this chat completions choice.

finish_reason.description: The reason that this chat completions choice completed its generated.

message.description: The chat message for a given chat completions prompt.

ChatCompletions.description:
Representation of the response data from a chat completions request.
Completions support a wide variety of tasks and generate text that continues from or "completes"
provided prompt data.

id.description: A unique identifier associated with this chat completions response.

created.description:
The first timestamp associated with generation activity for this completions response,
represented as seconds since the beginning of the Unix epoch of 00:00 on 1 Jan 1970.

model.description: The model used for the chat completion.

choices.description:
The collection of completions choices associated with this completions response.
Generally, `n` choices are generated per provided prompt with a default value of 1.
Token limits and other settings may limit the number of choices generated.

usage.description: Usage information for tokens processed and generated as part of this completions operation.

ChatResponseMessage.description: A representation of a chat message as received in a response.

role.description: The chat role associated with the message.

reasoning_content.description: The reasoning content the model used for generating the response

ChatRole.description: A description of the intended purpose of a message within a chat completions interaction.

values.name: system
values.description: The role that instructs or sets the behavior of the assistant.

values.name: developer
values.description: The role that provides instructions to the model prioritized ahead of user messages.

values.name: user
values.description: The role that provides input for chat completions.

values.name: assistant
values.description: The role that provides responses to system-instructed, user-prompted input.

values.name: tool
values.description: The role that represents extension tool activity within a chat completions operation.

clusters.description: List of clusters identified in the insights.

coordinates.description:
Optional mapping of IDs to 2D coordinates used by the UX for visualization.

  The map keys are string identifiers (for example, a cluster id or a sample id)
  and the values are the coordinates and visual size for rendering on a 2D chart.

  This property is omitted unless the client requests coordinates (for example,
  by passing `includeCoordinates=true` as a query parameter).

  Example:
  {
    "cluster-1": { "x": 12, "y": 34, "size": 8 },
    "sample-123": { "x": 18, "y": 22, "size": 4 }
  }

  Coordinates are intended only for client-side visualization and do not
  modify the canonical insights results.

CodeBasedEvaluatorDefinition.description: Code-based evaluator definition using python code

code_text.description: Inline code text for the evaluator

CompletionsFinishReason.description: Representation of the manner in which a completions response concluded.

values.name: stopped
values.description: Completions ended normally and reached its end of token generation.

values.name: tokenLimitReached
values.description: Completions exhausted available token limits before generation could complete.

values.name: contentFiltered
values.description:
Completions generated a response that was identified as potentially sensitive per content
moderation policies.

values.name: toolCalls
values.description: Completion ended with the model calling a provided tool for output.

CompletionsUsage.description:
Representation of the token counts processed for a completions request.
Counts consider all tokens across prompts, choices, choice alternates, best_of generations, and
other consumers.

completion_tokens.description: The number of tokens generated across all completions emissions.

prompt_tokens.description: The number of tokens in the provided prompts for the completions request.

total_tokens.description: The total number of tokens processed for the completions request and response.

completion_tokens_details.description: Breakdown of tokens used in a completion.

prompt_tokens_details.description: Breakdown of tokens used in the prompt/chat history.

CompletionsUsageDetails.description: A breakdown of tokens used in a completion.

audio_tokens.description: The number of tokens corresponding to audio input.

reasoning_tokens.description: The number of tokens corresponding to reasoning.

total_tokens.description: The total number of tokens processed for the completions request and response.
